summary:
Simply hides sheathed weapons from your back/hip.
<br />This works ONLY with FEMALE characters.
descriptionHtml:
Simply hides sheathed weapons from your character's back/hips.
This mod works ONLY with FEMALE characters.

[color=#ff0000][size=4][i][b]>>[/b][/i][/size][/color]T[i]his mod contains nif-files, so backup your [u]current skeleton files[/u] before overwriting them with these[/i]![color=#ff0000][size=4][b]<<[/b][/size][/color]
BACKUP folder contains unmodified files for VANILLA skeletons.

[color=#a4c2f4][b]MAIN FILE skeletons:[/b][/color]

Skyrim's vanilla skeleton
Acdale EyeCandy Body ADEC now TBBP Compatible [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5390/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5390/?[/url]
Calientes Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?[/url]
Custom Skeleton Replacers by Skulltyran [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16712/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16712/?[/url]
xp32 MAXIMUM Skeleton [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?[/url]

[b]
[color=#93c47d]+REQUESTED[/color][/b][color=#93c47d] [b]skeletons:[/b][/color]

CBBE TBBP reference skeleton fix by TheBoneRanger [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54044/?] http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54044/?[/url]
XP32 Maximum Skeleton Extended   [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?] http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?[/url]
[color=#f6b26b]
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]

New in 1.6 Version:

Major fixes has been made to xp32 MAXIMUM Skeleton.
(LATEST VERSION)


Same mod for male characters:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48514/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48514/?[/url]
